goal.ch: 藉由專題製作，讓同學將要製作的專題置入企業組織與運作中去了解其問題與需求，並學習思考如何透過資訊科技來加以改善或解決，過程中將整合過去所學的企管知識，系統分析與設計、程式語言、資料庫等知識，並學習以團隊合作的方式來完成。
goal.en: Through project development, students will integrate their proposed projects into business organizations and operations to understand related issues and needs. They will learn to think about how information technology can be used to improve or solve these problems. The process involves applying previously acquired knowledge in business management, systems analysis and design, programming languages, databases, and more, while fostering teamwork to complete the project.

outline.ch: 本課程主要是讓學生將過去所學的課程能夠綜合應用在一個完整的應用程式開發機會，並以專案的形式完成專題的實作。授課內容以當周的開發進度與主題進行教學與機會教育；學生同時接受團隊合作與實務開發的實際訓練。專題過程中並會提供適當的補充教材例如軟體開發方法、軟體專案管理以及團隊合作模式等等，以加強學生軟體開發實務的知識。
outline.en: This course aims to provide students with an opportunity to integrate and apply their previously acquired knowledge through the development of a complete application project. The course is conducted in a project-based format, with teaching and experiential learning aligned with the weekly development progress and project themes. Students will receive practical training in both teamwork and real-world software development. During the project process, supplementary materials such as software development methodologies, software project management, and team collaboration models will be provided as needed to enhance students‘ practical knowledge of software development.
